overview: Obsessed with the young mothers he filmed without their knowledge in squares, Steve found Remigio outfitter of choice. Photographer and videographer charming, the latter uses his profession to attract naive young women, often without adequate means, by promising a bright future ... and profit. It is, after many others, the path follows Silvia. Came to shoot a commercial, she was noticed by Remigio who sees in her a perfect target for his sponsors, men of all ages but all willing to pay ...
title: Italie Interdite 3
